name: Accenture
description: MuleSoft Technical Developer needed in Newcastle, United Kingdom for a team lead to specialist level posiiton at Accenture, a leading global professional services company that focuses on inclusion, diversity, and innovation where you will design, develop and deploy MuleSoft-based solutions, collaborate with teams, and provide technical guidance; preferable skills include MuleSoft development and certification, API design, DevOps, test automation, and strong communication skills.
